calendar.description: House Public Utilities and Energy Hearing

general_provisions: This resolution supports and encourages practices that exemplify religious freedom in public spaces.
hilighted_provisions: This resolution:<hr><ltbullet>acknowledges the historical context that supports the inclusion of religion in government and education;<hr><ltbullet>supports the right of public school students and teachers to openly express their faith;<hr><ltbullet>encourages the accommodation of religious observances in government and community settings;<hr><ltbullet>supports the protection of religious symbols in public spaces; and<hr><ltbullet>encourages the fostering of respectful dialogue among diverse faith traditions.
